name: vROOM RC RACING
description:
vRoom RC Racing is a miniature driving game where you explore a house in three tiny cars. Switch between a police car, a rally car and a 60's muscle . This one is my first projects with Unity 3D.

Controls:

  • 'ARROWS' keys or 'WASD' keys to drive the car
  • 'SPACE' key to handbrake
  • 'C' key to change view (camera)
  • 'Shift' key to Nitro
  • 'Escape' to reset
  • 'E' key to turn on police lights
  • 'Page Up/Down' key to switch gear (manual gear)

System Requirements: 

4GB RAM

Core i3

250MB Hard Disk
